items.title: Software Developer III
content: Helped develop Neptune Airflow Tool, a management and monitoring solution for Apache Airflow featuring DAG versioning,role-based access control, real-time pipeline monitoring, and multi-tenant support; achieved a 90%+ adoption by data engineering teams at Sam's Club.

items.title: Software Developer II
content: Contributed to design and development of Self-Service Data Ingestion (SSDI) tool, enabling users to build, manage and automate streaming/batch pipelines. Aimed at streamlining the orchestration process into Delta tables, it reduced pipeline development time by 85% and increased adoption by 60%.

Co-developed Sams Data Club (SDC), a unified data governance portal, streamlining data discovery and access control; reduced reconciliation time by 40% and contributed to $4M+ in annual cost savings forthe organization.

Worked on building a real-time Data Quality Monitoring platform (SDQ), improving anomaly detection speed by 3x, facilitating cloud migration and helping determining and preventing data issues that previously led to 15% operational inefficiency.

Collaborated with a cross-functional team to develop Data Armor (DA), a lineage tracking portal. Developed a lineage spark listener, capturing extensive lineage, achieving 80%+ lineage coverage for Spark jobs running in Airflow at Samâ€™s Club and improving auditability of data pipelines.

items.title: Coding Instructor
content: Led coding instruction sessions for students of varying ages and skill levels.
Facilitated hands-on coding projects and exercises to reinforce concepts and promote practical application.
